00024 #ifndef __MT_TIED_WORKER_THREAD_H__
00025 #define __MT_TIED_WORKER_THREAD_H__
00026 
00027 #include "mt/CPUAffinityThreadInitializer.h"
00028 
00029 
00030 namespace mt
00031 {
00032 
00036 template <typename Request_T>
00037 class TiedWorkerThread : public mt::WorkerThread<Request_T>
00038 {
00039 public:
00040         TiedWorkerThread(mt::RequestQueue<Request_T>* requestQueue, 
00041                          CPUAffinityThreadInitializer* cpuAffinityInit = NULL):
00042             mt::WorkerThread<Request_T>(requestQueue), 
00043             mCPUAffinityInit(cpuAffinityInit){}
00044 
00045         virtual ~TiedWorkerThread()
00046         {
00047             if (mCPUAffinityInit)
00048             {
00049                 delete mCPUAffinityInit;
00050                 mCPUAffinityInit = NULL;
00051             }
00052         }
00053         
00054         virtual void initialize()
00055         {
00056             if (mCPUAffinityInit)
00057             {
00058                 mCPUAffinityInit->initialize();
00059             }
00060         }
00061 
00062         virtual void performTask(Request_T& request) = 0;
00063 
00064 private:
00065         TiedWorkerThread();
00066         CPUAffinityThreadInitializer* mCPUAffinityInit;
00067 };
00068 
00069 }
00070 #endif
